summary: Previous feedback is no longer applicable given the clarified synchronous build; the current lazy init and route handling are acceptable.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Lazy init must handle async build, prevent concurrent builds, and reset on failure
previous_issues_status.notes: The content explicitly clarifies buildDiscoveryDocument is synchronous with no I/O or Promises, so async guarding and promise caching are unnecessary.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Route handler must await getDiscoveryDocument and handle errors from async build
previous_issues_status.notes: With synchronous build, awaiting is not needed; the try/catch around the synchronous call is sufficient.
